description: New to Smartwool's innovative Intraknit™ line is the Men's Intraknit™ Merino 200 1/4 Zip. This Smartwool® base layer is 3D-mapped for a near-custom fit and freedom of movement. Its engineered construction helps enhance your performance with a lighter weight and cleaner finish. If you're looking for base layer clothing for cold weather, this one uses Merino Sport yarn that combines the power and benefits of Merino wool with the durability and fast dry times of polyester—creating the ultimate performance-ready top for all of your high-energy activities.
name: Smartwool Intraknit Thermal Merino Base Layer 1/4 Zip - Mens

specs.value: Insulation, articulation and ventilation are seamlessly integrated to amplify movement and comfort during high-intensity activities
